subject: Acceptance Invitation
content:
Acceptance Invitation

Dear {recipient},

Your invitation to join a project in Odit has been accepted. We are delighted to have you as part of the team!

By joining this project, you will have access to its tasks, milestones, and team members. Your contributions and expertise will be highly valued.

If you have any questions or need further assistance, please feel free to reach out to us.

Best regards,

The Odit Team
